#summary List of runtime JAR dependencies for Morphia.

= Dependencies =

Morphia depends on the following third party JARs:
  * The [http://github.com/mongodb/mongo-java-driver/downloads MongoDB java driver], version 2.0
  * [Optional]
    * [http://sourceforge.net/projects/cglib/files/ CGLib]
    * [http://proxytoys.codehaus.org/download.html ProxyToys]

If you use [http://maven.apache.org Maven2] to build your project, it will automatically download all dependencies for you after you follow the directions on the GettingStarted page.
